I 100% agree that Bitcoin Cash supporters shouldn't try to pretend Bitcoin isn't Bitcoin. BTC is Bitcoin. It has the most accumulated proof of work originating from the genesis block, and the highest market cap, both by wide margins. Thus it's Bitcoin.

SegWit2x was a proposal to upgrade Bitcoin itself with SegWit and then a 2MB block. It failed to achieve majority support for the second part of that, thus the second part was called off. It was not a plan to create a pointless minority fork.

Does "folks who use deception as a marketing tool" include those who refer to the SegWit2x proposal as an "attack on Bitcoin by evil corporate shills"? That misinformation was pretty damn contagious as well. I wish all the extremists in this debate would cut the propaganda.
The vitriol in the Bitcoin community is causing at least as much damage to the project as regulators :/
